params.message: Starting ThoughtTransfer system upgrade with enhanced MCP integration and self-referential capabilities
Phase 1: Database schema enhanced with system_evolution, mcp_server_registry, and application_metrics tables
Phase 2: MCP server registry populated with current active servers (SQLite, GitHub, Filesystem)
Phase 3: Application architecture assessment complete - found strong PMCR-O foundation with orchestration system
Phase 4: GitHub integration confirmed - repository at https://github.com/ShawnDelaineBellazanJr/com.example.projectname.git
Upgrade Status: SUCCESSFUL - System enhanced with better tracking, documentation, and MCP integration
